de.uni_mannheim.informatik.dws.winter.matrices

Class SimilarityMatrix<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uni_mannheim.informatik.dws.winter.matrices.SimilarityMatrix<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the matrix' dimensions
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArrayBasedSimilarityMatrix, SparseSimilarityMatrix

    public abstract class SimilarityMatrix<T>
extends Object
    super class for all similarity matrices
    Author:
    Oliver

      • getMatches

        public abstract Collection<T> getMatches(T first)
        Parameters:
        first - the value for the first dimension
        Returns:
        returns all objects in the second dimension that have a similarity > 0

      • getMatchesAboveThreshold

        public abstract Collection<T> getMatchesAboveThreshold(T first,
                                                       double similarityThreshold)
        Parameters:
        first - the value for the first dimension
        similarityThreshold - the minimal similarity value
        Returns:
        returns all objects in the second dimension that have a similarity > similarityThreshold

        Normalise all values in the matrix in the range between 0 and 1.

      • makeStochastic

        public void makeStochastic()
        Changes the values of the matrix such that all values sum to 1, preserving the relative differences of the values

        Returns:
        returns this instance
